nodes.text: Dan Aykroyd was a famous actor within the galaxy. Although he shared a similar name with Star Tours' PR droid announcer, Dan Android, any relation between the two is unclear.

Dan Aykroyd was briefly mentioned in the "Spot the Droid" poster's bio for Dan Android, jokingly mentioning the similarities between the names, in the Tokyo Disneyland version of Star Tours. In reality, he is a well-known Canadian screenwriter, musician, comedian and actor.
